title: Tata's Indian Hotels Company expands reach with new unit in Kolkata
description: In a recent announcement, Tata group's Indian Hotels Company revealed the inauguration of Taj Taal Kutir in Kolkata. Situated in close proximity to the Kolkata International Airport, this new addition aims to offer a convenient and luxurious hospitality experience for visitors.â€‹
